body.raw:
{  
   "Name":"Discover new things",
   "Description":"A profile to discover new things",
   "DefaultUserName":"jn@centrify.com",
   "ComputerOUs":[  
      "DC=centrify,DC=lab"
   ],
   "Domains":[  
      {  
         "Name":"centrify.aws",
         "DomainId":"11111111-5254-495d-b4d4-22fc0f993899",
         "UserName":"jn@centrify.com",
         "NamingContext":"DC=centrify,DC=aws",
         "Enabled":false,
         "UsingDefaultAccount":true
      }
   ],
   "OSType":"Windows,UnixWithCDC",
   "ComputerType":"Server,Workstation",
   "SkipDiscovered":true,
   "ComputerGroups":null,
   "ApplicationType":"WindowsService,ScheduledTask,IISApplicationPool",
   "BypassAddAccountCheck":false
}

{  
   "name":"My Slack WebHook",
   "description":"",
   "url":"https://hooks.slack.com/services/T1C.../B9...",
   "method":"POST",
   "content_type":"application/json",
   "headers":"",
   "request_body":"{\n  \"attachments\": [\n    {\n      \"author_name\": \"Centrify Analytics\",\n      \"author_link\": \"https://${tenant_id}-${system.podscape}.${system.domain}/analytics\",\n      \"author_icon\": \"https://${tenant_id}-${system.podscape}.${system.domain}/analytics/ui/favicons/favicon.png\",\n      \"title\": \"Anomaly Session Found from Centrify Analytics\...",
   "enabled":true,
   "event_type":"Analytics.Server.AdaptiveSessionRecording",
   "risk_level":"Low"
}
